verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَابِ الْفِيلِ
verses.verseStringB: Have you not seen how your Lord dealt with the masters of the elephant?
Did He not make their plan go wrong?
And sent against them flocks of birds.
Striking them with stones of baked clay.
